name: Binary Bistro
description:
This was made over a weekend for the Butterscotch Shenanijam 2018. 

The theme I picked was "Void Sandwich", with the influence for that being the "void" terminology from programming languages. 

The main Shenanijam achievement I picked is One Punch Man (game using a single input, in my case the Space Bar). I wanted to explore what can be done with something that is either pressed or not pressed, so in harmony with the theme I chose to dive into the theme of binary numbers, where the "to-be's" and "not-to-be's" are combined to form much greater things (in this case Bacon). 

In terms of achievements this also qualifies for "Maverick",  since I made it by myself.

This was my first jam in Unity and I had fun, hope you'll have fun too :)
